text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Huh... Me, on a fashion magazine?
Oh, I don't know.

Well, it's fine...
But why did you think of me?

I don't really have a strong image of being
into fashion or anything like that.

Of course not.
I think it's because they like you, Juri?
Well, anyway, they're suggesting various things.
Would you like to take a look at the materials?

Yeah.
Hmm? ...Huh?
Is this really meant for me...?

These cute ones and the fluffy ones here,
they just don't seem to suit me at all.
No, I don't think that's true...

Besides, this project is about a girl transforming herself
over the course of a month.

Look, these clothes here are closer to your usual style, right?
They want to show the range of your outfits.
I see...

I understand the intention, but I'm not sure
if I can pull off all of these.

That's not true.
I think anything would look good on you, Juri.

First of all, the stylist suggested these
with you as the model in mind.

I see...
So, maybe they won't look too bad on me after all...?

Yeah, exactly. Plus, we'll discuss
what you'll actually wear in the end.

I can't promise anything too difficult,
but why not give it a try?

You can make it look appealing, Juri...
That's what the magazine folks and I think.

Got it.
I'll do it.

I want to do it for the producer
and everyone's expectations.

Oh... I see.
That's great to hear.
I'll reply right away.
Oh, right.
They also want to know about Juri's favorite items...

Huh...? I don't really have anything
worth telling someone like that...

I see,
then we might need to discuss the content a bit more.

It might be best for Juri to come in once
and have a meeting.
There seem to be quite a few challenges.

Haha, it's not just about coordinating outfits,
it's about expanding your range of work too.
You don't have to say it so smoothly.

Well, in reality, anything looks good on Juri,
so I'm not worried about this project.

No... That's why I said...
Don't just casually mention that!

There are some really cool suggestions here too...
This dress would look great on you too!

Take this opportunity to try out anything
that catches your eye.

Hey hey,
why are you more excited than me...?!

As a fan of Juri, I'm looking forward to it too,
this project.

...Jeez...
Flattery won't get you anywhere with me.
